name: wechat-boom
description: Electron Monorepo Project with Main, IM and Setting Windows

scripts.mac:build: pnpm --filter @wechat-boom/im-window mac:build && pnpm --filter @wechat-boom/setting-window mac:build && pnpm --filter @wechat-boom/main mac:build
scripts.win:build: pnpm --filter @wechat-boom/im-window win:build && pnpm --filter @wechat-boom/setting-window win:build && pnpm --filter @wechat-boom/main win:build
